column4: Sept. 24 (Xinhua) – The Cambodian Ministry of Interior (MoI) has sent three suspects to the Trial Chamber of Phnom Penh court on charges of ------kidnapping------.------ QING CHUN 2-CHENG JIAN BING and 3-CHI JIAN HUA  were arrested on December 22 in Phnom Penh and Preah Sihanouk province.------According to sources
column6: another Chinese was abducted after leaving NagaWorld casino in the area of ​​Tonle Bassac
column9: the family members of the victim went to the police to intervene after they were contacted with payment demands.------The three suspects confessed to the police
column10: and said their actions were  the result of debts from gambling losses at the casino. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/754543.html
